title: Dreamfall: The Longest Journey (Intel Cider)
description:
Release year: 2006
Developer: Funcom
Genre: Adventure



Requirements:
-------------
Mac OS version: OS X 10.4.11 
Processor: Intel Core Duo
RAM: 1024 MB
Video RAM: 64 MB (GMA 950 is not supported)
Harddisk space: 6,2 GB



Plot:
-------------
"Dreamfall: The Longest Journey" is the sequel to Funcom's "The Longest Journey", released in 1999, and takes place ten years after the events of the first game. The story focuses on three characters, Zoe Castillo, April Ryan, and Kian Alvane, who live in two parallel worlds: technologically advanced Stark and magical Arcadia. April was the protagonist of the first game, while the other two are new characters. The main storyline follows Zoe, a Stark resident who investigates her ex-boyfriend's disappearance and other mysterious occurrences that lead her to April. Meanwhile in Arcadia, April battles the villainous Empire of Azadi while Kian, an elite Azadi soldier, is sent to assassinate her. The game features returning characters from its predecessor, such as Brian Westhouse and Gordon Halloway, but playing "The Longest Journey" is not a prerequisite to understand its plot.



Known issues:
-------------
Sometimes items in the inventory box are shown incorrectly.
